name: blockNOT
description:
(version 0.2)

blockNOT is a logic platformer where you can switch tiles to pass through them.

You play for a couple of ?@#$?bots that have an ability to invert blocks around them. Your goal is to bring characters to the yellow zone. 

Note that the game is not finished yet!

This build (v0.2) contains 20 different levels to try.

Controls:
Arrow keys - movement (also Shift for acceleration)
X - invert tiles
Tab - switch character
M - mute music

Music by: Stateor

Share your opinion about the project in comments!
